name: The Loop of Truth
description:
you play a young kid who has halocinations, find out what his weird dreams mean











"Windows"

The game was made in Unreal Engine 5 within six months.

I am a 23 years old game design student from Germany and this is my fifth game.

 Feedback or opinions about the game are very welcome.

 I hope you have fun playing!

Mouse - Camera

 W A S D  - Movement

 T - Takligh

t Shift - Run

 Space - Jump

 E - Interact

 I - Inventory

 Q & E - Telescope zoom

 P - Pause

 ESC - cancle
